data.name: Sexy Milf Town
data.detailed_description:
Fantasy Town, is a 3D rendered story game that lets you choose your path in every story. Read through pages of fun chapters that fit your mood, from romance to suspense! Lots of new stories to enjoy.

Fantasy Town Episodes will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. Whether you're an avid reader of drama, comedy, fantasy, young adult, romance, girlfriend, or even a gamer, you’ll love this story game! Your love journey begins!

The game currently consists three art styles 2D, 2.5D and 3D for you to enjoy.
There are 4 chapters in 2D. This consists mini games too.
In 2.5D there are 3 stories. Each has more than 25+ chapters and some sprite animated scenes to enjoy. Chapters are the parts of story.
In 3D there are 2 stories with 5 chapters each.

data.short_description: lets you live your stories with love, romance, sexy adventure, and drama.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 720
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
